body_html: @classner can you try the cmake build? If you can make that work, then we know what needs to be added, and we can put it into the bazel build. Bazel really wants all its dependencies declared, so it would be good to have a clear picture of what exactly is missing.
body_text: @classner can you try the cmake build? If you can make that work, then we know what needs to be added, and we can put it into the bazel build. Bazel really wants all its dependencies declared, so it would be good to have a clear picture of what exactly is missing.
body: @classner can you try the cmake build? If you can make that work, then we know what needs to be added, and we can put it into the bazel build. Bazel really wants all its dependencies declared, so it would be good to have a clear picture of what exactly is missing.
